title: In game Full screen window problem
body: Any time when in game i put my screen setting to full mode it makes all the champions names and level move down to the right of the health bar. I dont know how to fix this and am tired of playing in windowed mode.

replies.body:
This probably has something to do with your configuration files for League. Let's try resetting those to see if that fixes that weird visual error.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know if that doesn't help!
